title: Open Journal
description: Excited to launch my new blog platform where users can browse, save their favorite posts, and enjoy a clean UI with dark mode support. Built using React, MongoDB, and Firebase Hosting. Would love to hear your thoughts!

title: Delivery Tracker App
description: A full-featured delivery tracking web app with parcel status, map, and admin dashboard.

title: FitNest - Fitness Booking Platform
description: A MERN-based platform for booking personal trainers, scheduling slots, and making payments with Stripe.

title: Tree Marketplace
description: A React project where users can upload, browse, and buy full-grown trees online.

title: Portfolio Website
description: My personal portfolio built with React and Tailwind, featuring projects, skills, and CV download.
